name: Copy waste more
description:
Copy paste layer properties

1. select layer
2. run copy to get its properties
3. select another layer
4. apply one of the following:

- width
- height
- position
- size
- layer name
- x (align left) 
- align right
- y (align top)
- align bottom
- scale to align left
- scale to align right
- scale to align top
- scale to align bottom

Tipp
You can either use the panel (Show panel) or the menu commands (which allows you to set system-shortcuts)

Greatly improves the workflow of repeated copy paste tasks.
